Texts.Chs: 阿威坎历史 —— 第四部分
消耗了很多时间和更多的资源，但最终阿威坎取得了胜利。 瑟连入侵者们被击败并被赶出了卡达文，但阿威坎民族陷入了混乱。 重建历时数年，第二次入侵来临时，我们才刚刚从第一次入侵中恢复过来。 那年是212 BF，另一小批瑟连入侵者抵达我们的星球。
Texts.Eng: It took much time and more resources, but in the end the Avikan emerged victorious. The Thelean invaders were defeated and driven off Kadavan, but the Avikan nation was in shambles. It took years to rebuild, and when the second invasion came, we had only just recovered from the first. The year was 212 BF, when another small army of Thelean invaders arrived on our planet.

Texts.Chs: 幸运的是，阿威坎现在为外星人的袭击做了更好的准备，而来袭的力量比第一次要弱。 战败后，我们了解了入侵者的真正意图：古者的废墟和文物。 瑟连正在袭击我们的世界，以获取这些古老的文物，即我们提升者的遗物。
Texts.Eng: Luckily, the Avikan were now better prepared for an alien assault, and the force that attacked was smaller than the first. After its defeat, we learned what the invaders were really after: the ruins and artefacts of the Old Ones. The Theleans were raiding our world to get their hands on these ancient relics, the relics of our Uplifters.

Texts.Chs: 弗赫林时代持续了超过一千年，直到第一次241 BF的瑟连入侵。阿威坎人与外来物种的第一次接触是残酷的。瑟连到处出没，袭击整个卡达文（Kadavan）的所有特惟（Terves），并在阿威坎之国留下一片片废墟。
Texts.Eng: The Era of Vhelin lasted for over a millennium, until the First Thelean Invasion of 241 BF. The first contact the Avikan had with an alien species was brutal. The Theleans came out of nowhere, assaulting Terves across Kadavan and laying ruin to the Avikan nation.
